messages.subject: Re: [Fwd: [nbtsc-l] Jeff Berry]
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 6/9/99 8:58:33 AM Pacific Daylight Time, mainmom@webtv.net writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 6/9/99 8:58:33 AM Pacific Daylight Time, mainmom@...
writes:

<< I took offense to hearing that working in a gas station is a pathetic
job. Now who's judging?

Mary in FL >>

When you're in need of gas for your car, a gas station becomes pretty darn
important in your life. Just like when you're craving a Big Mac, McDonald's
becomes pretty darn important. I don't think anyone should put down any job.
Mary Ellen.

messages.subject: Re: [Fwd: [nbtsc-l] Jeff Berry]

messages.messageBody:
